message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its unique features and capabilities make it an invaluable asset worth far more than its face value. Considering its unparalleled benefits and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, we are offering it to you for $2000000. We are confident this investment will yield significant returns and satisfaction for you.

Hello Alice, Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price you've set. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
